data.name: Wrestling Superstar "Rob Van Dam" - Playable Character
data.detailed_description:
Wrestling Legend, Extreme Icon, WWE Hall of Famer is shrinking down to size and is about to deliver a van-daminator to the competition as he joins the squad of "The Mean Greens - Plastic Warfare"

Rob Van Dam is best known for his appearances with Extreme Championship Wrestling (ECW) in the late 1990’s, with the World Wrestling Federation / World Wrestling Entertainment in the early to mid-2000s and then with Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA) in the early 2010s…
